It also mentions specific initiatives like the Academic Bank of Credits (ABC), FM radio, and innovation hubs.

eligibility_criteria: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field

academic_programs.program_name: Bachelor of Arts in English Literature
eligibility_criteria: Minimum SAT score of 1200 or ACT score of 25

career_path.summary: This text outlines career opportunities for individuals who have completed a specific course, likely in accounting or finance given the mention of ACCA. Graduates can expect to find over 500 job placements with well-known companies such as KPMG, PwC, EY, and Deloitte, with starting salaries ranging from 4 to 6 Lakhs per annum. Potential job roles include Auditor & Tax Consultant, Financial Planning and Analysis, Forensic Accountant, and Compliance and Risk Manager, with the encouragement to pursue a career in management.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
Students can apply for over 500 jobs with reputed companies like KPMG, PwC, EY, Deloitte, Grant Thompson, TATA Communications, Embassy Group, American Express, etc at a minimum package of 4 – 6 Lakhs p.a.
Some Job Roles for ACCA Candidates:
• Auditor & Tax Consultant
• Financial Planning and Analysis
• Forensic Accountant
• Compliance and Risk Manager
Take the next step towards a career in management.

sample_papers.summary: The provided text consists of repeated mentions of "SUAT 2025" followed by "Sample Papers". It appears to be a title or heading indicating sample examination papers for the SUAT 2025 examination.
